flavorText: When the world is consumed by chaos, the skilled and the foolish are on equal footing.

foreignData.flavorText: Auf Welten, auf denen das Chaos herrscht, haben Kluge und Dumme die gleichen Chancen.
foreignData.name: Griff des Chaos
foreignData.text: Immer wenn ein Zauberspruch oder eine Fähigkeit auf den Stapel kommt, bestimme das Ziel zufällig neu, falls der Zauberspruch/die Fähigkeit ein einzelnes Ziel hatte. (Wähle aus allen erlaubten Zielen.)

foreignData.flavorText: Cuando el caos consume el mundo, el hábil y el tonto están en igualdad de condiciones.
foreignData.name: Apretón del caos
foreignData.text: Siempre que un hechizo o habilidad vaya a la pila, si tiene un solo objetivo, vuelve a elegir su objetivo al azar (Select from among all legal targets.)

foreignData.flavorText: Dans un monde de chaos, idiots et sages se valent bien.
foreignData.name: Poigne du chaos
foreignData.text: À chaque fois qu'un sort ou une capacité ayant une cible unique est mis sur la pile, déterminez sa nouvelle cible au hasard. (Tirez au sort parmi toutes les cibles légales).

foreignData.flavorText: Quando il mondo è consumato dal caos, i saggi e i folli sono nelle stesse condizioni.
foreignData.name: Stretta del Caos
foreignData.text: Ogniqualvolta una magia o un'abilità viene messa nella pila, cambia il suo bersaglio con uno scelto a caso se ha un solo bersaglio (scegli tra tutti i bersagli legali).

foreignData.flavorText: Quando o mundo é consumido pelo caos, os habilidosos e os tolos estão em pé de igualdade.
foreignData.name: Garras do Caos
foreignData.text: Toda vez que uma mágica ou habilidade for colocada na pilha, re-selecione seu alvo, aleatoriamente, se ela tiver um único alvo. (Escolha dentre todos os alvos válidos).

name: Grip of Chaos
originalText: Whenever a spell or ability is put onto the stack, reselect its target at random if it has a single target. (Select from among all legal targets.)

rulings.text: If there are multiple legal targets, it may still choose the original one.
If there are no other legal targets, it keeps its target.

The ability triggers when a spell or ability is put on the stack, and this target-changing ability itself goes on the stack. This means that the spell or ability keeps its original target until this ability resolves. You determine the new target when this ability resolves, at which time the set of legal targets may have changed.

text: Whenever a spell or ability is put onto the stack, if it has a single target, reselect its target at random. (Select from among all legal targets.)
